author: AtomJump.com
name: medimage
description: An image server for the Android/iPhone app, MedImage.

scripts.preinstall: echo "1. Forever should also be installed with 'npm install forever -g'"; echo "2. Now create a log directory with 'sudo mkdir /var/log/medimageserv'";
scripts.postinstall: echo "3. You will need to 'sudo cp newconfig.js config.js' in the path this is written to, to get a fresh config."
